channel.title: Dung boss anims -- cant find
channel.description: where could i find animations for har'lak the rift splitter, to'kash the blood chiller, Night-gazer Khighorahk, Plane-freezer Lakhrahnaz, Shadow-Forger Ihlakhizan? and pls dont say something like Google, because i already tried that.

item.title: Dung boss anims -- cant find
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

pls guys pls help me out here…

Read full topic

item.title: Dung boss anims -- cant find
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“13lack drag, post:6, topic:404840”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=501798.msg3671582#msg3671582 date=1310957984]

im sure they are, as it is loading 634+, where could i find the animation id’s?

Applications such as RSBuddy will allow you to ‘debug’ and view the animation IDs/item IDs and such to aid yourself in making scripts. However, you could use the same approach to make content for a RSPS.
[/quote]
rsbuddy.com im assuming?
EDIT: how exactly would i get them with the client like?[/quote]
Once again, trying to interpret what’s being said. You’d log into RS and go find the NPC that you wish to grab IDs from.

Read full topic

item.title: Dung boss anims -- cant find
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

im sure they are, as it is loading 634+, where could i find the animation id’s?

Applications such as RSBuddy will allow you to ‘debug’ and view the animation IDs/item IDs and such to aid yourself in making scripts. However, you could use the same approach to make content for a RSPS.

Read full topic

item.title: Dung boss anims -- cant find
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

I must have not realized you were referring to animation IDs. Also you could attempt to see if the IDs of certain animations on current day RS are the same as your revision - it’s surely very possible.

Read full topic

item.title: Dung boss anims -- cant find
item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

if you have the id decode the appropriate item definition
if you need to get the definition resource data then simply extract from resource cache or send the update server a request

Read full topic

item.title: Dung boss anims -- cant find
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“13lack drag, post:2, topic:404840”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=501798.msg3671526#msg3671526 date=1310955659]
Well the IDs you’re requesting are from a revision that I’m sure most people don’t use, so the actual ID of that NPC could be different for each implementation.
[/quote]
you need the exact same each animation for each boss, i already foudn id’s[/quote]
I have no idea what I’m reading.

Read full topic
